info.name: starry twitter ✧・ﾟ
info.description:
dark, cute, customizable twitter theme; bg image credits: angela he (@zephybite)

(custom theme color only works if theme color set to default blue (more > display))
info.additionalInfo:
4-21
- Twitter update fixes
4-18
- Added options to change bg opacities for tweets and sidebar
- Quote retweets have bg now
- Display fixes
4-8
- Scroll length fix
- Compose tweet bg fix
- Added option to disable lowercasing for some text
3-22
- Image preview sizing fix
- Heart icon + counter now theme colored
3-17
- Now works with all backgrounds, not just dim
- Pop-ups now translucent
3-7-20
- Initial release
